reviewText: With Hard Body shows you get to see everything a woman has.  There are five women so they give lengthy performances.  Ashley Roberts the cover girl and Avery Adams were my favorites but then they are all nice.

Those of you who have grown up with Hot Body videos know exactly what to expect. Beautiful women in a softcore adult dvd. Full frontal and even closeups. The sad thing is that Hot Body is no longer producing new dvd's or VHS tapes and the prices are actually starting to rise. Check out ebay for some ridiculous bidding on Hot Body VHS tapes. When you find dvd's for less than $17 snatch them up. There aren't many out there and Sneaky Preview 74 is definitely one to grab.

If all you're looking for is beautiful women in a softcore situation, Hot Body videos are your thing. Sadly, Hot Body is no longer producing DVDs and VHS tapes. They are getting a lot harder to find and prices for some of VHS tapes are really soaring. When you can find DVDs in the $10 range it's a great deal as well as the VHS tapes.

If you are a collector, this is one to have in your collection. All reviews I post are of tapes and DVDs I own and do not recommend videos on a whim. Just check out other recommendations I've made.

If beautiful naked women is what you are looking for, this video will not disappoint.

I haven't bought these kind of videos for years. Be warned, there is very graphic nudity in this series. So if that is what you are looking for, I can't deny there is plenty of it. It may have been my fault, but there was no indication that it would get that extreme. But now you know. If the purpose of these "sneaky preview" videos was to show graphic female nudity, then they are certainly doing that, but I wish I would have known that from the cover notes. Don't watch this with your wife or girlfriend unless you want a frying pan shaped noggin. I'm going to leave this same review for the other one I ordered at the same time. If you want attractive ladies and fun music and exotic locations without the nudity, I recommend the Latin Dimes videos. But if you are going for the graphic, no holds barred nudity, this is a good series for it I guess. I would rate it one star otherwise.
